channel.title: Mrquarter - In need of major help
channel.description:
Hello. I run a server called R00nscape. I have been having some trouble when running my server.
I will start it up and it will start up fine.
People will be on and all is well.
Then suddenly, this will pop up:
[code]R00nscape Started Cheatprotection: on ClientHandler: Accepted from 84.27.31.32:33822 SaphireDream is signing onto server. Could not save for SaphireDream ClientHandler: Client SaphireDream disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 67.71.24.61:60586 nick is signing onto server. ClientHandler: Accepted from 209.200.224.105:55697 Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? [/code]
No it is not because I try to start up a second server, I don't know why it would do this.
That comes up in the middle of people playing. The server stays up and the players that are on can stay on.
But nobody else new can log onto the server until I restart it and a minute later, it does it again.
Please help somebody.

item.title: Mrquarter - In need of major help
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Anybody. I tried a differnet server/source. It is my computer. What would be wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: Mrquarter - In need of major help

item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Stanyer:

Check your antilag.java or restarthandler.java and change the time to 99999

I did, still nothing.

Read full topic

[quote=“zoltanman, post:7, topic:125731”][quote author=p0unding link=topic=176008.msg1618224#msg1618224 date=1185040797]
yeah stupid froob
[/quote]

Why are you calling him a “froob”, you’re the one who can’t read through a topic properly. Mrquarter, it’s just a common error, it happened to me on my dedicated, I forgot how I fixed it, but I lived throught it.[/quote]
Zoltan, I can’t live through it because I can’t run my computer now…

And do you still have your dedi?

Read full topic

item.title: Mrquarter - In need of major help
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:4, topic:125731”][quote author=p0unding link=topic=176008.msg1618192#msg1618192 date=1185038739]
lol the reason that is popping up is because your trying to run
the server two times. Take one away and it wont happend again.
Also consider changing your port if it does

~p0unding~
owner of poundingscape
[/quote]

Yeah, obviously you didn’t even read his post. Mrquarter, just reboot the computer, you might have ran hybridscape on the mopar client.[/quote]
I just did restart my computer. I don’t have MoparScape (webclient doesn’t work). I am on a brand new vista laptop.

It happens right in the middle of people playing.

This is what causes it:

if(!shutdownClientHandler) { misc.println("ERROR, port in use: "+serverlistenerPort+" - R00nscape is already in use!"); } else { misc.println("R00nscape is shutting down !"); }

Read full topic
item.source: Mrquarter - In need of major help
